Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires certain employees of the New York state department of corrections and community supervision to wear body cameras
Summary: Requires every parole officer and employee of the department of corrections and community supervision to wear body cameras with video and audio whenever they are interacting with a parolee; implements the use of cameras in every official office and room in the department.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring certain employees of the New York state department of corrections and community supervision to wear body cameras
